subject: Football
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Newton has the Panthers at 12-0, but among other contenders for the Most Valuable Player Award, Tom Brady is still a man on a mission, and a third possibility lurks under the radar.
snippet: Newton has the Panthers at 12-0, but among other contenders for the Most Valuable Player Award, Tom Brady is still a man on a mission, and a third possibility lurks under the radar.
